response_text:
http://www.bollywoodlife.com Bollywood News and Gossip | Bollywood Movie Reviews, Songs and Videos | Bollywood Actress and Actors Updates | Bollywoodlife.com Wed, 24 May 2017 18:30:00 +0000 en-EN hourly 1 http://wordpress.org/?v=3.6.2 HOT: Sunny Leone BREAKS her no kissing clause on her birthday – view pic! http://www.bollywoodlife.com/news-gossip/hot-sunny-leone-breaks-her-no-kissing-clause-on-her-birthday-view-pic/ Fri, 13 May 2016 07:08:16 +0000 Pooja Nayak http://www.bollywoodlife.com/?p=718405

Sunny just posted a kissing picture, putting an end to all the speculations surrounding her no kissing clause. Cheggit out..

So since yesterday there have been reports on how Sunny Leone has added a ‘No kissing policy’ to her contract. It all started with an observation made by a few who argued the reason why there have been no kissing scenes in any of Sunny’s recent films after Ragini MMS 2 is because the actress has warned the filmmakers that she will never kiss on screen. In fact, the observation was further proved in reference to her latest film One Night Stand which despite being based on an adult subject surprisingly had no liplocks between Sunny and her co-star. However, wait until you check out this latest picture.

Sunny, who celebrates her 35th birthday today, just put up this super hot picture of her kissing her husband Daniel Weber, quashing all the baseless rumours surrounding her ‘No Kissing Clause’. Yes! Taking up to Instagram, she also captioned this intimate moment saying, “Who said I don’t kiss on camera?!?!?! Ahem! Now isn’t that enough to clarify your qualms? Not to forget, Daniel too had EXCLUSIVELY revealed to BollywoodLife that Sunny hasn’t put up any such clause in her contract. Instead, the creative decisions are taken with other actors and the director.

Well, we love how Ms Leone has hit back in style, that too on her very birthday. Indeed, this picture must have come as a perfect return gift to all you fans. Right guys? Drop your love for Sunny in the comments below and do come back to BollywoodLife for more updates.

]]> Article SHOCKING! Rajinikanth’s Kabali BEATS Salman Khan’s Sultan! http://www.bollywoodlife.com/news-gossip/shocking-rajinikanths-kabali-beats-salman-khans-sultan/ Fri, 13 May 2016 06:56:59 +0000 Karan shah http://www.bollywoodlife.com/?p=718408

Read on to know why we say so…

We all know Salman Khan and Rajinikanth are HUGE superstars in their own space. Both the superstars have their own kingdoms (Bollywood and South respectively) and millions of fans too, however these two giants haven’t ever clashed with one another. There were reports that Salman Khan’s Sultan and Rajinikanth’s Kabali were going to clash this Eid, however yesterday we revealed to you how the clash has been averted after the makers of Kabali decided to release the film on July 1, a week before Sultan’s release. But it is Rajinikanth’s Kabali which has beat Salman Khan’s Sultan in a unique way. How?

The Kabali teaser has outperformed Sultan‘s teaser to become the most watched teaser ever. When the Kabali teaser was released on May 1, no one thought it would break records so many records, but it did! In just a day, the teaser crossed 5 million views and today, the Kabali teaser crossed 17.1 million views, making it the most watched teaser. The record was previously held by Aamir’s Dhoom 3 and Salman’s Sultan with just over 17 million views.

Kabali, directed by Pa Ranjith, is about an ageing don. With the teaser doing so well, we are sure that the Kabali will do fabulous at the box office. The distribution rights for the film are already selling at record prices. The audio of the film will be released on May 30 and the movie will hit theatres on July 1.

What do you think about Kabali‘s unique victory? Tell us in the comments section below! Check out the teaser of the film right here:

 

]]> Article Amidst break up rumours, Sidharth Malhotra and Alia Bhatt to team up for another Karan Johar film! http://www.bollywoodlife.com/news-gossip/amidst-break-up-rumours-sidharth-malhotra-and-alia-bhatt-to-team-up-for-another-karan-johar-film/ Fri, 13 May 2016 06:37:07 +0000 Karan shah http://www.bollywoodlife.com/?p=718398

The lovebirds were last seen together in Kapoor & Sons…

There was buzz that Sidharth Malhotra and Alia Bhatt are heading for a break up. While they have never openly admitted that they are in a relationship, close sources always maintained that they were very much together. However, with these reports of them fighting constantly making headlines, people thought that there was trouble in paradise and they would go separate ways. But seems like there is no truth the ongoing buzz.

We already know that the cute couple are going to romance each other in Aashiqui 3 and now, according to Filmfare, they have signed on for another film with Karan Johar’s Dharma Productions. The film will again be an intense love story and while we saw Fawad Khan in their last film together (Kapoor & Sons), this time we hear that it might just be the two of them.

At a recent event, when Alia was asked about their issues, she deflected the question and said, “Yaha par hum Ikk kudi ke baare mai baat kar rahe hai toh aap munde ko ghar pe hi chod dijiye (We are talking about a girl here, so leave the guy at home only).”

But this development puts an end to all those break up rumours. In the meanwhile, Sid is shooting with Jacqueline for the Bang Bang sequel. On the other hand, Alia is also shooting for the second part of Dharma’s hit franchise – Badrinath Ki Dulhania along with Varun Dhawan.

Are you also excited to see Alia and Sid in another Karan Johar film? Tell us in the comments section below! Also check out Alia Bhatt at the Udta Punjab – Ikk Kudi song launch in the video right here:

 

]]> Article PDA Alert: Bipasha Basu just expressed her love for Karan Singh Grover underwater – watch video! http://www.bollywoodlife.com/news-gossip/pda-alert-bipasha-basu-just-expressed-her-love-for-karan-singh-grover-underwater-watch-video/ Fri, 13 May 2016 05:55:28 +0000 Pooja Nayak http://www.bollywoodlife.com/?p=718354

And their monkey love continues…

Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover are setting stupendously high standards for all those in love, oh yes! After a beautiful, fairy tale wedding in Mumbai, the two have taken off to Maldives to have a romantic beachy vacay and boy, are they the hottest honeymooners in town? I mean. just look at their honeymoon pictures and you would know what I am trying to say. Bipasha has been putting up super romantic updates on Instagram be it a picture of her hubby chilling by the sea or she flaunting her honeymoon tan sporting the sexiest bikini, their holiday is turning out to be nothing short of perfect. However, wait until you check out their latest PDA, underwater. Yes!

Gushing over the feeling of being in love, Bipasha just posted a video that has ‘Monkey Love’ written with pebbles, on the walls of their infinity pool. Aww! Are they the cutest love birds? Not to forget, Bipasha and KSG always refer to each other as Monkeys. In fact, even their wedding invites, gifts, mehendi and everything was personalised with ‘Monkey’ written/drawn on it. Now if this doesn’t prove their ‘crazy in love’ relationship then I dunno what will.

A photo posted by bipashabasu (@bipashabasu) on May 12, 2016 at 2:00am PDT

 

Mr and Mrs Grover will be leaving from the Maldives today and heading to the US for an extended honeymoon. We love how these ‘Monekymooners’ are making the most out of this holiday. Are you too wanting to go for a vacation like theirs? Pack your bags and do make sure to take tips from these craziest love birds in town!

Watch Bipasha and KSG’s ‘underwater’ PDA below…

A video posted by bipashabasu (@bipashabasu) on May 12, 2016 at 9:34pm PDT

 

]]> Article A biopic on Sunny Leone’s life? Here’s what the actress has to say… http://www.bollywoodlife.com/news-gossip/a-biopic-on-sunny-leones-life-heres-what-the-actress-has-to-say/ Fri, 13 May 2016 05:06:47 +0000 Pooja Nayak | Upala KBR, DNA http://www.bollywoodlife.com/?p=718336

Sunny Leone makes an affirmation on her 35th birthday, talks about her husband and lots more…

Sunny Leone has already had her fair share of controversies this year — the most notable being on a TV news channel where she was asked harsh questions about her past as a former adult star. But Sunny sailed through that with dignity and plenty of support from B-Town and today has moved on. She turns 35 today (May 13) and we catch up with the actress who’s shooting for Splitsvilla in Puducherry…

How are you planning to celebrate your birthday this year?

I don’t have any particular plans other than working. I don’t expect much from anyone, but I did hear that my team has something planned. They are very sweet. My husband is also flying down to the Splitsvilla set from the US to spend time with me.

How do you usually celebrate your birthdays?

I don’t usually celebrate them. The last few years I have been working. I think for most people the best birthdays were when we are younger. As a kid you look forward to your birthday and the party that is planned. Now I am happy to just spend it quietly and I only expect a couple of people to wish me happy birthday who are closest to me.

What’s the best birthday gift that Daniel has given you?

With Daniel my birthday is a year-long one as he is always showering me with gifts. I am a lucky girl. But a gift I would like to give myself is a day with my family and dogs. That would be the best gift in the world!

You love animals?

I have always loved animals. And as you go through life you also become aware of them and how much love a little or big animal can give you. Their innocence and purity is what draws me to them. They want to just be exactly what they are and have no bad intentions towards anyone so we as human beings must nurture their wants and shower them with love.

When you entered Bollywood did you come with any expectations?

No, I did not come with any expectations. It was all really new to me and I did and still now think this is a big gift and opportunity that was offered to me. I believe in hard work and at this moment in my life my work and working hard is my main priority. I am not someone that focuses on birthdays or holidays. I know realistically that all will end one day and when it does then I can celebrate my birthday and holidays every day.

What has been the toughest challenge till now?

The toughest challenge is trying to figure out what is the next movie I should sign. I have realised that there is no way to surely know if a film you choose is the right decision or not. I have seen so many films in these years that people are expecting to do well and they don’t do well at the box office. And for no rhyme or reason a movie you didn’t know about does amazingly well. I have come to the conclusion that my main goal is to just keep making movies where I love the story. If I love it then I am making it. As long as movies are being offered to me then I will continue to work. I have to let the production house do its job to promote the movie well and hope it does. If they don’t, I can’t take it personally. It’s hard to do this and I am still trying to come to terms with this but I have to try.

How do you cheer yourself up when you feel low?

I try my hardest to engross myself in work. I tell myself that I work every day and that is all that matters. I internalise it and then push it away and look to the positive. I have some amazing people around me that love me and make me feel better. Knowing my family and friends are happy, safe and healthy is what makes me happy. I hate seeing others hurt or people in pain — it affects me deeply.

People have always said you and Daniel are madly in love.

Yes we are. He is my best friend, my lover, my confidant, and my whole world. I respect him as a person and he does the same for me. We met each other at a hard time in our lives and we got through it together. God took my parents from me and he gave me Daniel as my angel to watch over me and my brother. He is the one person who looked after the both of us when it felt like our world had ended with my parents dying. We always work together and have clear boundaries. We talk about everything. Yes we are like all normal couples who bicker back and forth but at the end of the night we always say I love you to each other.

It’s been seven years since your marriage. Seven ways to a perfect marriage?

Respect, compromise, unconditional love, generosity (I don’t mean gifts/ I mean with affection and love), compatibility, more love and as I always say ‘Happy wife… Happy life!’ Lol.

What do you think of Bollywood actresses Deepika Padukone and Priyanka Chopra making it in Hollywood today?

I think that it is wonderful. That world is so different to Bollywood and I know that it is very difficult to make an impact there. They have done something that most actors want to achieve. I am so proud of them!

Are you a feminist?

I don’t like labels. I do believe that as a woman I must stand on my own two feet and work to the best of my ability. I do not let people pull me down. They try to push and I might fall but I promise I will stand again and I will be stronger. It’s a tough world in general. I have had women and men who have not been nice, so for me everyone is the same and if you want to succeed then you must push forward.

Have you and Ekta Kapoor had a fall out? Since post Ragini MMS2 you haven’t done a film together.

No not at all. I own a BCL team with her show. We see each other often and are friends. We have not done another film because that is just how it has worked out. It has no bearing on our relationship or respect for each other. I admire her a lot as a woman and as a businesswoman.

What made you decide to produce Bollywood films?

It is the other way around. Bollywood decided on me! I have always wanted to make mainstream films and when it was presented to me I took it with both hands and jumped in. We are still developing things. I have signed on other movies as an actress and once that is finished then I will be able to focus on my own. I am not someone that wants to rush into this at all. It is all a process and I want to do it right. That I am very clear about.

Your life has been a very interesting one. Ever thought of a biography on yourself?

Not at this moment but it is something that is proposed to me all the time. I think people are definitely curious about my life so we shall see when the right time to take that forward will be.

Aamir Khan had said he would cast you in one of his films.

I am always grateful that he even said that out loud. We will see what happens.

One liners

Beyonce or Rihanna or Madonna? And why?

Beyonce because I love that she doesn’t care about anything and does what she wants.

Flirty or intense romance?

Intense romance.

Three quality that draws you to a man

Confidence, style and his business sense.

A quality in a man that puts you off

Arrogance.

Is there a Mr Perfect?

Always…

Live in relationships are…

Are ways to get to know your partner. See if you need two bathrooms or not because boys can be messy. Lol.

One mantra you live by…

Create my own path.

Describe yourself in five words…

Hard-working, driven, ambitious, silly and happy.

One professional mistake that you will never make…

Second guess who I am.

Three things you would want to change about yourself…

Caring too much about others when they don’t give a #$%& about me, try to be more open minded about changes, OCD with time.

Three things you wish you had…

My parents, that my brother lived walking distance to me and a horse.

Three people you rely on/trust completely and why…

My husband — obvious reasons.

My brother — because he is my blood and we are very close.

Hitesh Kipopara, my stylist, because he has been by my side through my journey here in Bollywood. Good times and bad… Money and no money. He is my brother from another mother.

Three moments you want to relive?

My wedding, when I purchased my home — such a proud moment for Daniel and because we both struggled to get it and when Aamir Khan called me after my interview with CNN/IBN and Shah Rukh Khan asked me to do a song in his movie.

An incident in your life that affected you the most and why?

When my parents died… I talk about this a lot because I see where I am today and I hope that they are proud of me. I wish everyday that I could just call them and tell them about it all.

Three times you felt let down…

I feel down when my movies don’t do well, when people unnecessarily attack me and when i miss my family and dogs in the US.

An average day in your life…

Every single day is different but mainly I work and work some more. My day starts with breakfast, gym, working on set or promotions and that’s it but every day the job changes. It’s never the same.

My song of the moment:

Bad Reputation by Joan Jett

]]> Article Sunny Leone birthday special: Baby Doll, Pink Lips, Do Peg Maar – take a look at 7 sizzling songs of the actress! http://www.bollywoodlife.com/news-gossip/sunny-leone-birthday-special-baby-doll-pink-lips-do-peg-maar-take-a-look-at-7-eye-catching-songs-of-the-actress/ Fri, 13 May 2016 04:50:10 +0000 Karan shah http://www.bollywoodlife.com/?p=718223

The actress celebrates her 35th birthday today…

After appearing on Bigg Boss 5, Sunny Leone entered Bollywood and made it her home. The actress made a huge transition seamlessly and became an overnight sensation. Though she was already popular, she has now become the most searched celebrity online. In an industry that still refuses to treat its female actors at par with the men, she has proved her worth and made a huge impact. The Khans have also noticed her in the recent times and after bagging a song in Shah Rukh Khan’s Raees, we are sure she’ll be seen in more films.

Apart from acting, people have loved her dance numbers. Be it films like Ragini MMS 2 or Ek Paheli Leela or One Night Stand, she always has exciting numbers that become instant chartbusters. Baby Doll was her BESTEST song till date, but there are a few other songs too. Here is a list of 7 songs that the actress made us groove to…

Laila (Shootout At Wadala)

Sunny Leone’s fabulous moves in this item number in John Abraham‘s film will make your day. The song is catchy and the actress looks hot as ever in the track.

Kabhi Jo Badal Barse (Jackpot)

Sunny’s sultry avatar in this super romantic song is the best ever. She looks breathtaking and Arijit’s voice has made sure this song remains with us forever.

Baby Doll (Ragini MMS 2)

Kanika Kapoor’s Baby Doll from Ragini MMS 2 is one of the biggest dance numbers by the former adult actress. It won all the awards and was the most heard song of 2014. The trendy lyrics coupled with fabulous music and a super hot Sunny Leone, made it one of the biggest tracks till date.

Pink Lips (Hate Story 2)

Sunny ‘s seductive avatar in Hate Story 2′s Pink Lips was one of the most loved avatars of the actress. After Baby Doll, everyone wanted to see the actress in another fast track and that’s when Pink Lips was introduced and people instantly fell in love with it.

Desi Look (Ek Paheli Leela)

Ek Paheli Leela bought back the seductive side of Ms Leone in a desi avatar. She donned super sexy outfits for the song and we have to say that she looked fabulous in each one of them.

Hor Nach (Mastizaade)

If one was not enough, then the Mastizaade makers gave us two Sunny Leone‘s in this sex comedy. While the hottie’s double role was super entertaining, the Hor nach song took it to another level.

Do Peg Maar (One Night Stand)

Sunny Leone is back with another fabulous dance number and this song has a message for us too! It basically tells us to drink two shots and forget all the problems in life and enjoy. Th actress will make you groove with the fast track and fabulous steps.

So go ahead BollywoodLifers, enjoy these superb tracks of Sunny Leone and drop in your birthday wishes in the comments section below!

 

]]> Article Salman Khan hit and run case: Victim challenges the actor’s acquittal in the Supreme Court, demands more compensation! http://www.bollywoodlife.com/news-gossip/salman-khan-hit-and-run-case-victim-challenges-the-actors-acquittal-in-the-supreme-court-demands-more-compensation/ Fri, 13 May 2016 04:38:34 +0000 Karan shah http://www.bollywoodlife.com/?p=718276

The High Court had ruled in the favour of the superstar a few months back…

Salman Khan was acquitted of all charges in the 2002 hit-and-run case by the High Court last December but it seems there hasn’t been any relief for the actor. After nearly 13 years, the Khan family was relieved but the joy was short lived as one after the other, someone would challenge the decision of the high court. Earlier, the Maharashtra government tried to challenge the decision and now, the victim of the accident has also appealed in the Supreme Court.

Niyamat Shaikh, who was allegedly hit by Salman Khan’s car, has appealed against the actor’s acquittal in the case. The victim wants the Supreme Court to hear his plea when the highest court considers the Maharashtra government’s appeal against Salman’s acquittal. The daily wage earner is seeking more compensation after alleging that the accident lead to his disability and so, he can’t earn money ona regular basis. He even mentioned that he is the sole bread-earner and his family is struggling to make ends meet. For that reason, he wants the court to help him receive more compensation from Salman for the hardship he is going through.

Niyamat alleged that the High Court ignored the provision in sections 357 and 357 A of the CrPC, which provided for compensation to victims of crime. He now wants the Supreme Court to hear him out as he believes that the victim is also an integral part of the justice delivery system.

Family members of the other victims, have also filed petitions against the Bombay High Court verdict, which acquitted the actor in the case. They are also seeking more compensation. They want the Supreme Court to take into consideration the account of Salman’s police guard, Ravindra Patil, who was also present in the SUV at the time of the crash. and also a complainant in the case. According to Times Of India, the petition read, “It is submitted that the court of sessions had taken the correct view of the matter and the HC committed a grave legal error in reversing its finding. The HC erred in labelling the evidence of Patil as weak solely on the basis of omissions in the FIR.”

What do you think will happen next in this case against Salman Khan? Tell us your thoughts in the comments section below! Also check out how the son and wife of a deceased victim had challenged the actor’s acquittal in the video right here:

 

]]> Article Aishwarya Rai Bachchan leaves for Cannes 2016 with her cutest bundle of joy Aaradhya – view HQ pics! http://www.bollywoodlife.com/news-gossip/aishwarya-rai-bachchan-leaves-for-cannes-2016-with-her-cutest-bundle-of-joy-aaradhya-view-hq-pics/ Fri, 13 May 2016 04:18:44 +0000 Pooja Nayak http://www.bollywoodlife.com/?p=718280

And the Bachchan Bahu is finally off to steal the show. Are you excited to see her on the red carpet?

So for everyone who has been eagerly waiting for Aishwarya Rai Bachchan to walk the red carpet at Cannes 2016, today is the day. Yes! The Sarbjit actress along with her cutest companion Aaradhya has finally taken off to Cannes for the prestigious film festival – the proof of which lies right here in these above pictures. Spotted twinning with Aaradhya in black and white, the mother daughter duo were all smiles as they posed for the cameras at the airport. In fact, Aaradhya looked the happiest as she couldn’t stop giggling, walking hand in hand with her pretty mom. Aww! How we love this beautiful sight of Aaradhya accompanying Ash to the Cannes?

Not to forget, it’s going to be Ash’s 15the year at the Cannes this year, which explains why everyone is super excited to see what she would be wearing at the red carpet this year. Will she go all desi slipping into a saree? Or will she experiment with her fashion choices by going bold and beautiful? Well, you can continue guessing but blame it on her Sarbjit promotions, Ash for all that we know, hasn’t got the time to prepare much for her Cannes appearance this year. In fact, she had even admitted the same in her earlier interview saying, “Cannes Festival is two days away and I still don’t know what I am wearing. You guys can troll me as much as you want but the fact is I have just been too busy.”

(Image courtesy: Yogen Shah)

Aishwarya will be walking the red carpet tonight and tomorrow (May 13-14) representing brand L’Oreal. Do you think she will turn out to become the show stealer at the show? Drop your thoughts in the comments below and we’ll be back with more updates on Cannes 2016 right here.

 

]]> Article Look what Priyanka Chopra did on the last day of her Baywatch shoot – view pic! http://www.bollywoodlife.com/news-gossip/look-what-priyanka-chopra-did-on-the-last-day-of-her-baywatch-shoot-view-pic/ Fri, 13 May 2016 04:10:50 +0000 Karan shah http://www.bollywoodlife.com/?p=718282

The film is all set to release on May 19, 2017…

After completing the first season of Quantico, Priyanka Chopra has now wrapped up the shoot of her Hollywood debut film Baywatch too. The pretty actress, who will be essaying the role of the villain – Victoria in this film based on the popular show of the same name, had just returned to the shoot a few weeks back. And within days of her return, she has diligently completed her part on time. Baywatch, which also stars Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson and Zac Efron, is now nearly ready except a few final sequences with the two actors.

Priyanka Chopra and the other ladies in the film – Kelly Rohrbach, Alexandra Daddario and Ilfenesh Hadera have completed their shoot last night. The full team was enthusiastic on their last day and they finished a few crucial shots last night, before heading to a wrap up party. The whole team including Priyanka Chopra had a grand party with lots of music and food and it seems they danced a lot. After the party, the Baywatch team also posed for a photo before dispersing. We see Priyanka along with Kelly, Ilfenesh and Seth Gordon in the picture and we have to say that the Bollywood diva looked smashing. Dressed in a white dress with a bun hairstyle and red lipstick, she caught are attention immediately.

However, Zac and Dwayne were missing from the action. While the latter was shooting for Neighbours 2, the former was shooting else where. Priyanka will now make her way to Mumbai and will rest for a while, before starting work on her Bollywood projects. She will return back to New York later in the year for the second season of Quantico.

Till then check out the Baywatch team’s picture from the wrap up party above and tell us what you think about it in the comments section below! Also check out how Priyanka brightened up our day in the video right here:

 

]]> Article Cannes Film Festival 2016: Sonam Kapoor, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Katrina Kaif, Mallika Sherawat – Bollywood divas who courted controversies! http://www.bollywoodlife.com/news-gossip/cannes-film-festivals-2016-sonam-kapoor-aishwarya-rai-bachchan-katrina-kaif-mallika-sherawat-bollywood-divas-who-courted-controversies/ Fri, 13 May 2016 03:50:13 +0000 moumita bhattacharjee http://www.bollywoodlife.com/?p=718153

What’s a celebration without some scandal!

Controversies go hand in hand with Bollywood anywhere it goes. After all, our actors are some of the most popular people in the world and everyone has their own way of dealing with stardom. Cannes Film Festival is essentially a platform to showcase talent from across the world and for trade, film reaches a lot more territories. But for India, more attention is paid to who’s wearing what on the red carpet with the gorgeous divas of Bolly-land strutting their stuff on it. However, since a few years, it has also triggered a few controversies which are unpleasant at best. Let’s take you on tour of the same…

Aunty mat kaho na! 

Aishwarya Rai went to Cannes for the first time in 2002 with Shah Rukh Khan and Sanjay Leela Bhansali on tow at the premiere of Devdas. Since then she has been a regular as she became the ambassador of a cosmetic brand. But in 2009, there were talks that the company has replaced her with Sonam Kapoor as they were looking for a younger fresh face. So when the actress was asked to comment on it, she said, “Aishwarya Rai is an actress who used to work with my dad (Anil Kapoor), so I should call her aunty, right?” We wonder what Akshay Kumar‘s son Aarav will call Sonam when he debuts. Just saying! Oh and this is how Aishwarya shot her down politely then…

(Video credit: Zoom)

Miss the Mrs

Last year, Katrina Kaif debuted in Cannes and made a lot of headlines. Her getups were appreciated and talked about but it was her snub to a question about Aishwarya, that set tongues wagging. Katrina was asked if she would be exchanging tips from Sonam and Aishwarya since it’s a debut that year, she said, “I definitely intend to keep in touch with Sonam, get her feedback and tips. But beyond that I think if I was trying to emulate or copy someone, that would be wrong.” Guess Salman has to be blamed here… ex of your ex always gets axed you see!

Mallika bares it all… with words we meant!

Mallika Sherawat walked on the red carpet for her film with Jackie Chan, Myth and our eyes popped. The dresses she wore made everyone take note of her. But that was nothing compared to her ‘India is hypocritical’ verse that followed. That angered the whole country like never before. The ‘Dhirty phawhlitics’ couldn’t really gain much despite such an explosive interview.

Count us out…err! Why?

Something really mysterious happened with the brand that both Aishwarya and Sonam endorse. They decided to cut them out of their print ad that had them with all the beautiful ladies associated with the brand from all over world. The explanation of the same is still awaited.

 

No designer for Richa? 

When Richa Chadda first time walked the red carpet at the Cannes Film Festival, apparently, designers weren’t ready to dress her up. She had hurriedly pieced together a dress with the help of her friends, as per rumours. But in 2015, she had 15 designers queueing up to design her her gowns for the gala. So what changed? Guess talent overpowered glamour finally!

]]> Article
